testimonials.name: Kamini
testimonials.comment: Excellent treatment for almost all Teeth related problems. Great staff and Doctors. Doctor's assistant is very helpful and nice. Thank you specially to Dr.Aarathi S for right guidance and advice. Good clinic ambience and Sterlization seperate room and strict protocols followed. Recommend for value dental care DR.AARATHIS WINNING SMILE MULTISPECIALITY DENTAL CARE CLINIC.

testimonials.name: Bharat
testimonials.comment: Dr Aarathi has decades of experience. She explained the treatment very nicely and cleared all doubts related to tooth problem. She kept following up with me throughout the treatment and ensured no discomfort. Clinic ambience is very good with soft music in the background. Overall, a good experience. Thank you!

testimonials.name: Payal
testimonials.comment: I used to be so scared of visiting the dentist, but she has been incredibly patient with me. I've had more than five cavities filled, and she made the process much easier.

testimonials.name: Vaibhav
testimonials.comment: Dr.Aarathi is our family Dentist , our entire family is taking dental treatment and we are very happy last 13years. Good quality treatment and excellent Dental service prvided. Got dental extraction, teeth cleaning done painless,zero pain.

about.title: Meet Our Doctor
about.description: She is committed to providing you with the highest quality care in a comfortable environment.

team.name: Dr. Arti S Bangare
team.bio: Dr. Arti has over 15 years of experience in cosmetic dentistry and is committed to providing the highest quality dental care.

bookAppointment.title: Book Your Appointment
bookAppointment.description: Schedule your visit with our dental experts. We'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
